Minnetonka.Greenwood, Minnesota:
Greenwood is a city in Hennepin County, Minnesota, United States. The population was 688 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 0.61 square miles (1.58 km2), of which 0.36 square miles (0.93 km2) is land and 0.25 square miles (0.65 km2) is water.
